about_the_game: Step into the shoes of the main characters in the Office Affairs demo and experience the first taste of workplace drama and romance that defines the full game. Explore the daily grind at a high-profile company while juggling flirtations and budding relationships with several attractive colleagues and even your own boss. Manage your professional ambitions without letting romantic entanglements spin out of control, and discover how each dialogue choice affects your future. This playable demo introduces key characters, showcases the immersive 3D visuals, and lets you sample the branching story paths. Will you climb the corporate ladder or follow your heart? The choice is yours.
